description: Optimizing geometries of a batch of molecules with the same spin and charge
molecules_comments:
List of molecule names in the input folder, such as h2o.xyz. 
 Optimize all the molecules by default.
spin_comments: Spin for each molecule. If spin is null, multiplicity will be guessed based on the neutral molecule.
charge_comments: Total charge of each molecule. If both spin and charge are null, neutral molecule is assumed.
constraints_comments: List of Constraints. Must be consistent with the list of molecules. See https://geometric.readthedocs.io/en/latest/constraints.html#input-format
xc_comments: Exchange correlation functional such as b3lyp, pbe, tpss, hf, b3lyp-d3bj.
verbose_comments: Print level for PySCF. 0: None, 4: INFO, 6: DEBUG.

solvent.method_comments: Method for implicit solvent model, such as CPCM, IEFPCM, COSMO, SS(V)PE.

maxsteps_comments: Max number of iterations for geometry optimization.
convergence_set_comments: Convergence criteria for geometry optimization. See geometric.readthedocs.io/en/latest/how-it-works.html#convergence-criteria
